text: Aattuvela is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by N. B. Raghunath, starring Anu Anand and Rasika in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sangeetha as Malu * Rajan P. Dev as Neelakadan * N. F. Varghese as Joppen * Renuka as Sugandhi * Anu anand as Appuni *Salim Bava as Parunthu * Machan Varghese as P.D.C. *Elias Babu as Markose * Baburaj * Reena ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Aattuvela
